articles.title: 'Ring of steel' call for care homes - BBC News
articles.description: Residents and staff in the UK's care homes need better protection from coronavirus, the National Care Forum says.

articles.author: Lucia Binding
articles.title: Coronavirus: Currently 'no evidence' that COVID-19 survivors have immunity, WHO warns - Sky News
articles.description: Epidemiologists warn there is no proof that antibody tests can show if someone who has been infected cannot be infected again.

articles.description: The number of people who have died of the Covid-19 infection may be much greater than thought when deaths outside of hospitals, especially in care homes, are counted
